name: Artifact Removal with Total Variation
label: TV_Filter
description:
Apply a Total-Variation Minizimation-based Filter on tiff stacks, to remove structured artifacts (i.e. scratches, curtaining, or stripes) that span an angular range in Fourier Space.
The range of intensities will be removed with a 'Missing Wedge' in Fourier Space and the lost information will be recovered with TV-Min

parameters.name: wedgeSize
parameters.label: Angular range for the 'Missing Wedge' in Fourier Space (Degrees)

parameters.name: kmin
parameters.label: Miniumum Frequency to Start the Missing Wedge

parameters.name: theta
parameters.label:
Orientation of the Missing Wedge (Degrees)
0 = Horizontal & 90 = Vertical
